title: Extended Hand-to-Big-Toe
description: Balancing, Hip openers, Standing Primary body parts engaged Ankles, Calves, Hamstrings, Quadriceps Abs, Glutes & Hip Flexors Strengthens legs, stretches hamstrings Tones digestive system Improves balance and focus How to perform Extended Hand-to-big-toe Begin in Mountain Pose. Shift your weight to your right foot. Bend your left knee with an exhale and hook your big toe with your left index and middle fingers. Bring your right hand to your hip with an inhale. Slowly extend your left foot out and up with an exhale. Draw your shoulder back.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
